name: Gravity Fell (alpha)
description:
Something happened and gravity disappeared on our spaceship. You can only move by releasing oxygen from the suit. Pick up the cards and move on to find the broken mechanism.

Controls by arrows, R for restart. If you run out of oxygen you can no longer move, you need a restart.

This is an alpha version with only 5 levels.

Art - Veksell.

Code - Vadim Ivshin.
